content: निबंधनं {@--1@} The act of fastening, binding together. {@--2@} Constructing, building. {@--3@} Restraining, checking confining. {@--4@} A bond, fetter. {@--5@} A tie, band, support, stay; आशानिबंधनं जाता जीवलोकस्य <ls>U. 3</ls>; यस्त्वमिव मामकीनस्य मनसो द्वितीयं निबंधनं <ls>Māl. 3.</ls> {@--6@} Dependence, connection; ते त्वदाशानिबंधनाः <ls>M. 4. 14</ls>; परस्परनिबंधनः <ls>Pt. 1. 79</ls> ‘inter-dependent.’ {@--7@} Cause, origin, ground, motive, basis, foundation; वाक्प्रतिष्ठानिबंधनानि देहिनां व्यवहारतंत्राणि <ls>Māl. 4</ls> ‘based on’ &c.; प्रत्याशा° <ls n="Māl.">3</ls>; अनिबंधन causeless, accidental; <ls>U. 5</ls>, <ls n="U.">7.</ls> {@--8@} Abode, seat, receptacle; <ls>Māl. 2. 6.</ls> {@--9@} Composing, arrangement; <ls>Ku. 7. 90</ls> (रचना). {@--10@} A literary composition or work, a treatise. {@--11@} A grant (of land), an assignment; सद्वृत्तिः सन्निबंधना <ls>Śi. 2. 112</ls> (where निबंधन means ‘a treatise’ also). {@--12@} The peg of a lute. {@--13@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) Syntax. {@--14@} A commentary.
